titleStmt.title: An apologetical vindication of the Church of England in answer to those who reproach her with the English heresies and schisms, or suspect her not to be a catholick-church, upon their account.
titleStmt.author: Hickes, George, 1642-1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Attributed to George Hickes. cf. NUC pre-1956.
